title: EV maker Ampere inaugurates its first experience centre in Tamil Nadu
description: Stating that Ampere is investing significantly in people, technology and infrastructure, the company said it is moving ahead with an aim to provide a phygital experience wherein discerning buyers can check out the latest products, understand the world of EV and Ampere, interact with EV experts, engage through digital interfaces for simple and easy understanding of EV technology.
